name: DINA
description:
Defeat communism using HELICOPTERS!
Send the rescue helicopter to Chile, and save it from the red threat with Augusto Pinochet, you being the pilot!

Fly near mountains, and throw communists to trash cans with your chopper!
Do not collide with the soviet ones, though, can lead to FIERY end!

FEATURES:

You can dump the reds in trash cans, and challenge Allende in epic fight!

Easy to learn, hard to master. Start with favor speed, and end with merciless mess!

Power-ups, given to us by ameri... khem... provided by our partners, that can ease our mission!

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR, SOLDIER? WE MUST FIGHT THE PU!

Game controls:

Increase height - Up key

Decrease height - Down key

Throw a communist out of a helicopter - Space button
